article: My name is Sally Miller. I am a student in No. 3 Middle School. Look! This is a ruler. It's yellow. It's not my ruler. Who lost it? " Anna, is this your ruler? I ask my friend. " No, it isn't. My ruler is white. And it's in my pencil box now, Anna answers. " Excuse me, Jack. Is this your ruler? " No, it isn't. My ruler is black. Jack answers. " You can ask your cousin Jenny. She can't find her ruler. " Hi, Jenny! Is this your ruler? I ask. " Yes, it's mine. Thank you very much, Jenny says. She is very happy to find her ruler.
